ðŸ“– Summary: Streamdown is a TypeScript library that serves as a drop-in replacement for react-markdown, specifically designed for handling streaming Markdown content, particularly from AI models. It excels at gracefully formatting incomplete or unterminated Markdown blocks, making it suitable for real-time content generation and display.
